reviews.review_header: Best Tab for 3K Range.Read full review
reviews.review_text: Don't believe negative reviews.First read this full review,then decide to buy.I bought this tab for Rs 2800(including 500 cash back) in paytm.Design:Design is good.There are no colour options.Only you can get black colour.On the back side of the tab you can see Micromax logo and Canvas Tab Text.Overall design is good.Display:There is WSVGA TFT IPS display.I thought it would be bad.But it is very nice.Storage:There is only 8 GB internal.You get around 4 GB usable.Many people complain about storage issue.I will say solution to it later in this review.You can expand the storage by adding SD card.Performance:No hanging issues.Able to run moderate games like subway surfers,temple run and mini miltia.I played heavy games like asphalt 8,asphalt 7,modern combat 5,asphalt xtreme,nova 3 and gangster Vegas.Whatsapp is working.Just download whatsapp apk.All ran well.Browsing is smooth.It is powered by 1.3 gh mediatek quad core processor with 1 GB of ram.No other tab offers this specification at this price.Battery:Many people complain about poor battery life.Thanks to lollipop OS.Lolipop has a battery saver that on when your battery is 15%.But you can on whenever you want.You can do this by going to setting-battery-battey saver and on it.It works well.I play mini militia with friends via LAN WiFi.I had 15% battery.I turned on battery saver.I played 3 matches each lasting 15 minutes.Then the battery was 12%.Reading purposes:I also use this tablet to study.Display is good for reading.I turn on battery saver when I want to read.I also watch videos from learnnext which requires flash.I just installed dolphin browser and flash player apk and enabled flash from settings in dolphin browser.It ran well.So you can see flash content.I also have Microsoft Office Apps.Connectivity:Wifi range is very good.No SIM slot.But when your in a non wifi zone.Just turn on hotspot from your phone and connect it in your tab.Then you can browse.Camera:Camera is not great.Rear camera is 2 MP and front is a VGA Camera.You can improve picture clarity by installing Google camera.Protecting the tablet:Many find it difficult to find a case for this.Buy ACM 360 degree rotating case.There are many colour options.I have the red one.Dont buy flip covers.Their quality is not good.Buy the case from eBay cause it is just 179 rupees.Amazon adds shipping charges.Screen protector that comes with the tab is good.Rooting:You can root this tab using KingRoot.Then download Linktosd and move every user apps to SD card.I have 5 heavy games that are more than 1GB everything in SD.Game OBB and Data files save in sd card.So no storage issues.You can also install game mods such as Xmod.Overall:This tab is best for 3K.You can go blindly without thinking.Micromax has done a good job.Don't forget to hit helpful button.

reviews.review_header: Very nice tab at this price
reviews.review_text: Very nice in look... Light weight... Bright screen.. Ideal for gaming which are less than 1g.b ... Whtsapp.. You tube... Facebook... And daily social activityAlso u will get screen gurad and otg cable in packAdv... U can switch between storage easly... For more storge opetion.Dis. Adv. ... Many apps unable to dowloadbale form play store directly... (Solution... Download in mobile , than share it to this tab)Enjoy value for money tab

This is value for money tab .  In shortPros: Good for internet surfing through wifi, viewing pdfs, ppts, movies ,it has loud audio, has simple fm with good quality audio,  can play light games, kids app, good battery backup. Has Android lollipop version. Pendrive can be connected. Tab is Light weight.Good as photo slide show. No heating or hanging problem yet. Good for students. Using it since two weeks and faced no problem.Cons:Low pixel density(167ppi) therefore text cannot be smooth and sharp, no magnetic sensor therefore no compass app works for direction, no Flash, no calling. But still I have given 5 stars for its value for money.Got from Flipkart at 3000rs -10% on sbi card. Package contains tab, charger with cable, otg cable, screen guard and manual.  Press the helpful button if you think so.

reviews.review_header: after 3 months it will star lagging and battrey back up sucks to the core
reviews.review_text: dont by this tab.after 3 months it will star lagging and battrey back up sucks to the core .it takes 4 hrs to charge.go for some other tab but not for this tab .becuase i used it for 6 months the system gets crashed very sooni hate this tab

reviews.review_header: Great phone I loving it work smooth and no lags ...
reviews.review_text: Great phone I loving it work smooth and no lags on subway surf. OTG Plus point and Cast Screen Plus point. Do you know what is cast screen. It works on any smart led tv . play android games on big screen without attaching any cable via wifi. Thanks to amazon.

I only use it for reading and minor web browsing, have had it for over a month now with absolutely no complaints except for the charger pin stopped working but Ihink that's because someone pulled it the wrong way.  The device itself is an absolute gem. It's just perfect for reading epub and Kindle.

reviews.review_header: Internal Memory 4 GB only not 8 GB
reviews.review_text: Specification in the box is showing Internal memory 8 GB but in the Tab storage its showing Total Internal memory 4 GB, used for application 1 GB and balance 3 GB. yes we can expand but why they mentioned 8 GB.

We cant expect a tab from 3k rupees range features of 10k+ tab. But what i feel and disappointed is screen quality. The prime purpose of buying this tab is read pdf filesAnd now i feel blurry and reflective making eyes strain. Otherwise all features are good considering the low budget. Remember it's not 15 or 20k tab

Worst product, when you try to downloads apps like SBIMF, Money control, ICICI direct, ICICI Bank etc, it says app can not be installed for your device. You have to always use internet browser to open webpage.

reviews.review_header: Good at price but bad at display
reviews.review_text: Pros- good product , loud sound, otg support, wifi support etcCons- screen resolution very bad, camera bad, memory card slot bad, notification screen small not upto tab size, battery drain, slow to charge

A decent value for money product with decent performance.  It was performing satisfactorily till the time its micro SD card slot got burned along the Strontium Micro SD in it.  I got it repaired at the service center however the blame game is being played by both the companies and I do not know who was the actual culprit.  That's the reason I have downgraded the rating for the same.

reviews.review_header: Cheap Price and Rich user interface, it's a perfect match.
reviews.review_text: Tablet has worked well so far, it is smooth in functioning and gives good user experience. However it feels heavy if you hold it for long time, but I don't have any dissatisfaction with this product for now.

Nice tab at reasonable cost. It certainly met my expectations. I am using it basically for reading e-books, preparing notes and browsing the internet. If you want to use it for photography then I don't recommend it, as the camera is not very good. But you can't expect a better camera at this price.

Very good value for money.  The screen quality may not be as great as Samsung but otherwise it is good in every way. Keeping thousands of photographs in folders and viewing them in gallery is quite comfortable. Editing is also quite easy.

Awesome tab in 3.2k range. You can make internet calls. Though hardware is not too good(processor speed)  as compared to other 7-10k Lenovo tabs. But overall good. You can buy if you want a tab not for high definition gaming but for official work & everyday use. Both the camera is just FALTOO.  Battery life is very good.

reviews.review_header: Go for it if you are looking for a tab under 4000 inr .absolutely worth it  !!!
reviews.review_text: Guys , go for it , exellent packing and amazing speed speed delivery by amazon , its a best budget tab under 4000 inr which u can get . awesome tab with 1 gb ram which allows to play heavy games like asphalt smoothly.

This tablet is actually a  nice handset. The day it came it was a bit though to handle it but later it became handy. This was my first tablet  and it proved out to be pretty good except  for the camera which is not a big deal.

Gr8 product and good price, if voice calling is not required then this is the best tab available at this price, I bought it from my lil daughter, she is enjoying her rhymes and games on the tab, I am thoroughly satisfied

This is the best tablet i found in this price range , i have been using this for 7 days now and trust me its working absolutely fine with no lags.to be more precise i am using this for just watching Videos on Youtube, i haven't played any games on it yet.Speaking about Prons-1) Price - For me i purchased it for 2999/-2) It has 1 GB RAM and 8 GB ROM at such a cheap price.3) Battery back up i found good can watch 2 to 3 movies on 1 charge.4) Display is good at this price5) It supports OTG (I havent tested it yet)Cons- Its just about the camera but who uses camera in a Tab, u can make video calls and that's what the camera is for.Verdict- If u r tight on ur budget and if u r getting this for 2999 or around 3500 go for it blindly or if u can add little more money , I will suggest go for Lenovo Tab 2 A7-20 which costs u arround 4500 to 5000 reason is just because it has IPS display.

reviews.review_header: Great tab for the given price with modest features.
reviews.review_text: Delivery was really swift. Product  is good and does Web browsing well. Display isn't good(viewing angles are worst). One can experience stock android for the price. Experience is consistent.Please don't peg hopes with its camera. I brought it for Web browsing & mild gaming and the tab does its job by far.  Thanks to Cloudtail & Blue Dart.Pros: Affordability,Lollipop 5.0, user friendly,no heating issue,good performance,simple but handy design.Cons: Battery life sucks,recharging the battery is like a decennial affair,Camera,display quality.If camera & display isn't the issue,it could be the best tab within the range of 10k.

The colours & display are not that great especially in bright light.  For the price, it might be offering good value.It is bought for a specific usage; hoping it will serve that purpose and lasts long with public use.

Excellent !! Its a cheap and best tablet under Rs. 4000 . And its gpu is mali-450 mpIt can easily run the games .. I played big games like "gangster vegas ","the dark knight rises","indigo propacy/farenheit","mortal kombat x", "gta san andreas " .,etc., the games can be played without lags.!!

Received item within 3 days of ordering with normal delivery. The box include tablet, charger with USB cable, an OTG cable and screen protector.Pros:It is really cheapThe tab is faster with 1gb RAM, 1.3 GHz quad core processor. Never felt lag for browsing, using Facebook and YouTube.Wifi reception is goodThe tab comes with stock ROM and an app from micromax. No custom skins or interface.No heating issues while normal usage.Cons:The battery drains very quickly, tab will run about 4 hours on internet browsing.The charge is slow as compared to other devices of similar size battery using same charger.The screen display uses old technology, if you are getting used to IPS display you will notice the difference.Overall:The tab is good if you are tight on budget. You get what you pay. It is not good to compare this tab with other tabs of price ten times. You can use this tab for reading ebooks, emails, browsing internet, watching movie. The tab is not definitely for high end games and heavy apps.

reviews.review_header: Nice tab in less price for kids.
reviews.review_text: Nice Tab in less price. Charging takes time and battery drains quickly if used frequently. Sometimes internal storage vanishes and so you can't play any stored videos on that and you have to factory reset the device. Best option is to store everything on sd card.

reviews.review_header: what should i say about this product all the person ...
reviews.review_text: what should i say about this product all the person has said but still i will say if you are thinking to buy then without hesitate buy this product

reviews.review_header: it is a very good product. The tough sensitiveness is not too great
reviews.review_text: Its been a week since i bought this tab. For its price, it is a very good product. The tough sensitiveness is not too great, but its okay. You cannot install too many apps it will clog up RAM and slow down. If you use it based on its RAM, memory understanding its hardware limits, you will have a good experience. Bottom line : Good among the low cost Tabs

reviews.review_header: Lies in the description, horrible screen.
reviews.review_text: Specs aren't bad but the screen is definitely not IPS. It's a crappy LCD TN screen with a very bad viewing angle. You literally have to look at it from head on or else the colours and brightness become horrible. I had bought a Digiflip for about the same amount previously and it had a beautiful screen in comparison. I'm worried that this screen will damage my kid's eyes, it's so bad.

Build quality is good. Tablet is fast for daily applications. Sound is decent. Only con (and this is a major issue as far as I am concerned) is that the view angles for the display are terrible. While the pixel density is not bad, you can only use the tablet only in a narrow angle range of about 15 degrees, that too not straight on, at about 30 degrees. Maybe it is just my piece which is like this. If you are particular about the display, see it physically somewhere before you buy this.

I BOUGHT IT FROM CLOUDTAIL ...IT IS REALLY VERY NICE...I PERSONALLY RECOMMEND IT AT THIS PRICE RANGE...I LOVED IT...CLOUDTAIL SEND A GOOD ONE...NOT ONLY THIS PRODUCT ALL THE PRODUCT WHICH I HAVE BOUGHT FROM CLOUD TAIL ARE VERY VERY GOOD ..THANKS TO CLOUDTAIL...AND ALSO PERSONAL THANKS TO AMAZON....

I will rate this tab 6/10 coz the thing that really disappoint me is the screen quality it's horrible otherwise it is good enough.......U can go for this but u should buy an tempered glass for it....No late....Good battery....

reviews.review_header: Nice product at this price point.
reviews.review_text: Not to expect much at this price point.

I think it's just for the first time user of smartphone and tab user.  Many issues with my tab.  Once internal storage remains less than 2 gb out of 4gb it starts hanging. Apps arranged on screen automatically disappear. If you keep plugged in after 100% it starts reducing 98%97% and so on.  Usb connection to pc do not detect memory card regularly.  Do not support pendrive or data card through otg so only depend on Wifi.  When Wifi is turned on backup is less than 2 hours.  I tried first time to return but no response from amazon.  No contact option to seller. It have hotspot I don't know why because it cannot work with both functions on.Suggestion -  if you want a tab for reading books, newspaper, checking mails, and watching videos with  minimal or say no app or have budget problem (on Wifi only) then go for it but if you want to  use almost everything you can do on pc then avoid it.I am ready to help anyone wants to know anything about it before buying just write below and wait few hours.  I have been using this for more than a month.
no sim slot be alert during buyng

reviews.review_header: Don't buy this product. Tab is not charging and ...
reviews.review_text: Don't buy this product. Tab is not charging and its automatically charged after power dry and hanging issues. I went service center and they told, there was some hardware issue in this product. Then they replaced new one after 35 days. I just used only 10 days. I suggest please go with other product.

The product is worthy for its price. Display quality is really bad. It is very harmful to your eyes. It causes a great strain. Battery drains fast if internet is used. Google Chrome becomes slow gradually. Another disadvantage is the viewing angle. However OTG cable, and screen card are also included in the box. Both Cameras are bad.

Brought for jst reading pdf and internet browsing. Working fine with no lag.used for 4 days and product shown its true colour .cheap quality. Showed chinese letter whrn started. Asked for return.Cant shut down..pathetic .plz dont buy this product it is EAC certified not CE certified. Moreover its internal memory is around 4gb  not 8 gb but ram is 1 gb.

Good for daily use and normal use. Good battery backup. Good picture quality for watching movies and videos. Sound is good. But it has Lollipop and 1gb ram. It may lag and work slow sometimes(Its natural for 1gb ram). Clear the recent apps, there will be no lags probably. Actually a good product at this price. Its also good for reading purpose. Good for users who use it for video, internet, reading but not for gaming. It can connect to internet using dongle via the OTG cable provided with it.

reviews.review_text: I bought this for my daughter. Not Good for kids. Too much glare on the screen. Causes lot of strain for the eyes.

reviews.review_header: This is the cheap and beat toy which is helping ...
reviews.review_text: This is the cheap and beat toy which is helping my kid learn alphabet and numbers addition and subtraction and nursery rhymes with game apps. I all parents should by this for their kids of age above 4
Nice product

Nice and responsive tab for Rs. 4000. The Mediatek processor isn't the best one out there but it does the job. Tab heats up a little on playing casual games like clash of clans and candy crush. Haven't played heavy ones yet. Camera is poor but display is decent. Battery lasts for 12-16 hours depending on usage. Headphones aren't provided with the tab as written in product description. Also there is no light sensor as written in the product  details.  Amazon should have a mechanism to cross-check the product details provided. It's actually cheating your customers if they don't get what is claimed by the product. OTG support and wifi connectivity is good. Overall, a good tab for browsing internet, reading eBooks and occasional gaming.

reviews.review_header: Design is good. There are no colour options
reviews.review_text: Don't believe negative reviews.First read this full review,then decide to buy.I bought this tab for Rs 2800(including 500 cash back) in paytm.Design:Design is good.There are no colour options.Only you can get black colour.On the back side of the tab you can see Micromax logo and Canvas Tab Text.Overall design is good.Display:There is WSVGA TFT IPS display.I thought it would be bad.But it is very nice.Storage:There is only 8 GB internal.You get around 4 GB usable.Many people complain about storage issue.I will say solution to it later in this review.You can expand the storage by adding SD card.Performance:No hanging issues.Able to run moderate games like subway surfers,temple run and mini miltia.I played heavy games like asphalt 8,asphalt 7,modern combat 5,asphalt xtreme,nova 3 and gangster Vegas.Whatsapp is working.Just download whatsapp apk.All ran well.Browsing is smooth.It is powered by 1.3 gh mediatek quad core processor with 1 GB of ram.No other tab offers this specification at this price.Battery:Many people complain about poor battery life.Thanks to lollipop OS.Lolipop has a battery saver that on when your battery is 15%.But you can on whenever you want.You can do this by going to setting-battery-battey saver and on it.It works well.I play mini militia with friends via LAN WiFi.I had 15% battery.I turned on battery saver.I played 3 matches each lasting 15 minutes.Then the battery was 12%.Reading purposes:I also use this tablet to study.Display is good for reading.I turn on battery saver when I want to read.I also watch videos from learnnext which requires flash.I just installed dolphin browser and flash player apk and enabled flash from settings in dolphin browser.It ran well.So you can see flash content.I also have Microsoft Office Apps.Connectivity:Wifi range is very good.No SIM slot.But when your in a non wifi zone.Just turn on hotspot from your phone and connect it in your tab.Then you can browse.Camera:Camera is not great.Rear camera is 2 MP and front is a VGA Camera.You can improve picture clarity by installing Google camera.Protecting the tablet:Many find it difficult to find a case for this.Buy ACM 360 degree rotating case.There are many colour options.I have the red one.Dont buy flip covers.Their quality is not good.Buy the case from eBay cause it is just 179 rupees.Amazon adds shipping charges.Screen protector that comes with the tab is good.Rooting:You can root this tab using KingRoot.Then download Linktosd and move every user apps to SD card.I have 5 heavy games that are more than 1GB everything in SD.Game OBB and Data files save in sd card.So no storage issues.You can also install game mods such as Xmod.Overall:This tab is best for 3K.You can go blindly without thinking.Micromax has done a good job.Don't forget to hit helpful button.
Very bad product; which I have seen in myllife. ..wish I give it 0 view...

The product is worthy for its price. Display quality is really bad. It is very harmful to your eyes. It causes a great strain. Battery drains fast if internet is used. Google Chrome becomes slow gradually. Another disadvantage is the viewing angle. However OTG cable, and screen card are also included in the box. Both Cameras are bad.

reviews.review_header: Product not as what is expected
reviews.review_text: The Tab internal memory is supposed to be 8 GB but am surprised to note that its 4.29 GB...

reviews.review_header: Great product very low price on time delivery 1 day ...
reviews.review_text: Great product very  low price on time delivery 1 day 6pm 1gb ram supports all games HD display great product lot of inner memory cool product would recommend to buy
I got this tab for 3000rs and for 3k it's worth it.. Display is not so good but acceptable at this price, battery life is also good.. Overall a decent tab in 3k

reviews.review_header: Best budget tab in the price range
reviews.review_text: Best for reading and browsing..Low quality screen resolution  but worth your moneyLoud soundsNo lag on Medium level games average battery life

reviews.review_header: Good for Normal usage, Not for Gamer..
reviews.review_text: Good for normal use.. Not for gaming or heavy use..I am using this only for my office BYOD purpose.. It's working fine.Space/Memory issue will be there as apps are growing in there features and sizes..
